TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi NativeWindow extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window
Public Class NativeWindow Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IWin32Window
public ref class NativeWindow : MarshalByRefObject, System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window
type NativeWindow = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IWin32Window
.class public auto ansi NativeWindow extends System.MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供窗口句柄和窗口过程的低级封装。

span.span: Provides a low-level encapsulation of a window handle and a window procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类自动管理窗口类的创建和注册。This class automatically manages window class creation and registration. 当窗口与窗口句柄关联时，它不符合垃圾回收的条件。A window is not eligible for garbage collection when it is associated with a window handle. 若要确保正确地进行垃圾回收，必须使用手动销毁句柄 或使用释放句柄 。To ensure proper garbage collection, handles must either be destroyed manually using or released using . > [!NOTE] > 当处理 WM_NCDESTROY 消息时，将调用方法。The method is called when the WM_NCDESTROY message is processed. 这意味着，在某些情况下，你无需手动调用 ，但这是一种很好的做法。This means there are cases in which when you do not need to manually call , but it is good practice to do so. 类提供以下属性和方法来管理句柄： 、 、 、 和 。The class provides the following properties and methods to manage handles: , , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在窗口过程中截获操作系统窗口消息，并创建具有特定操作系统窗口类名的窗口。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure, and creating a window with a specific operating system window class name. 该示例创建了两个从中继承 的类。The example creates two classes that inherit from that accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类挂接到传入构造函数的窗体的窗口过程中，并重写 方法以截获 `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` 窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercept the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示 如何使用和 方法来标识将使用的窗口句柄 。The class demonstrates the usage of the and methods to identify the window handle the will use. 句柄根据和事件进行分配 。The handle is assign based upon the and events. `WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收到窗口消息后，类会调用 `form1.ApplicationActivated` 方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. `MyNativeWindow`类创建一个新窗口，并将 设置为 `BUTTON` 。The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the set to `BUTTON`. 类演示如何使用 方法并重写 方法，以截获接收的窗口消息。The class demonstrates using the method and overriding the method to intercept window messages that are received. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 编译器提供的默认构造函数。This is the default constructor provided by the compiler. 该类还具有一个初始化应用程序域范围消息处理程序和哈希表的静态构造函数。The class also has a static constructor that initializes application domain-wide message handlers and hash tables.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssignHandle(native int handle) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: The handle to assign to this window.
Assigns a handle to this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 截获发送到参数的窗口消息 `handle` 。 intercepts window messages sent to the `handle` parameter. 使用 将句柄的窗口过程重置为默认窗口过程。Use to reset the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure. 方法调用 方法以指示属性的值 已更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the value of the property has changed. > [!NOTE] > 要分配的句柄不能在不同的应用程序进程中。The handle to assign cannot be in a different application process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在窗口过程中截获操作系统窗口消息。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure. 该示例创建一个继承自的类 以实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类挂接到传入构造函数的窗体的窗口过程中，并重写 方法以截获 `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` 窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercepts the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示如何使用 和 方法来标识将使用的窗口句柄 。The class demonstrates the use of the and methods to identify which window handle the will use. 该句柄根据 和事件进行分配 。The handle is assigned based upon the and events. `WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收到窗口消息后，类会调用 `form1.ApplicationActivated` 方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. 此代码摘自类概述中所示的示例 。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示某些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 此窗口已经具有一个句柄。

span.span: This window already has a handle.

exception.span: 未能检索关联的本机窗口的窗口过程。

span.span: The windows procedure for the associated native window could not be retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateHandle(class System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams cp) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub CreateHandle (cp As CreateParams)
abstract member CreateHandle : System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams -> unit override this.CreateHandle : System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams -> unit

span.span: A that specifies the creation parameters for this window.

summary.span: 使用指定的创建参数创建一个窗口及其句柄。

span.span: Creates a window and its handle with the specified creation parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cp`参数指定传递给本机 Win32 `CreateWindowEx` 方法以创建窗口及其句柄的值。The `cp` parameter specifies the values that are passed to the native Win32 `CreateWindowEx` method to create a window and its handle. 如果 字段不是 `null` ，则新创建的窗口句柄继承自指定的类。When the field is not `null`, the newly created window handle inherits from the specified class. 例如，如果 设置为 `BUTTON` ，则新创建的窗口将基于 Win32 `BUTTON` 窗口类。For example, if is set to `BUTTON`, the newly created window is based on the Win32 `BUTTON` window class. 对象的属性 必须为 `null` 或引用已声明为结构的类的实例。The property of the object must either be `null` or reference an instance of a class that was declared as a structure. 此代码摘自类概述中所示的示例 。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示某些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅。See for the whole code listing. > [!NOTE] > 提供的类名注册到操作系统。The class name provided is registered with the operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建具有特定操作系统窗口类名的窗口。The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name. 该示例创建一个继承自的类 以实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindow`类创建一个新窗口，并将 设置为 `BUTTON` 。The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the set to `BUTTON`. 这将创建一个 Win32 按钮窗口。This creates a Win32 button window. 设置按钮的位置和大小，以及指定其他窗口样式。The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles. 类演示如何使用 方法并重写 方法，以截获接收的窗口消息。The class demonstrates how to use the method and override the method to intercept window messages that are received. 尽管该示例查找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 的消息，但可以使用特定于所创建的类型的窗口消息将其替换为实际程序。Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this can be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件类型将其窗口消息发送到窗口父级而不是窗口。Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 平台 SDK。See the Windows Platform SDK for more information. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 尝试创建本机窗口时操作系统资源不足。

span.span: The operating system ran out of resources when trying to create the native window.

exception.span: 本机 Windows API 未能创建指定窗口。

span.span: The native Windows API could not create the specified window.

exception.span: 当前本机窗口的句柄已赋值；即 属性不等于 。

span.span: The handle of the current native window is already assigned; in explanation, the property is not equal to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DefWndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Public Sub DefWndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The message that is currently being processed.

summary.span: 调用与此窗口关联的默认窗口过程。

span.span: Invokes the default window procedure associated with this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，仅 当你截获窗口消息并且需要默认窗口过程来处理消息时，才调用方法。Typically, you only call the method when you are intercepting window messages and would like the default window procedure to handle the message. 不应调用来向窗口发送窗口消息;改为调用 Win32 `SendMessage` 函数。 should not be called to send a window message to the window; call the Win32 `SendMessage` function instead. 当属性为0时，调用错误 。It is an error to call when the property is 0.

para.span: 在派生类中重写此方法，以便为特定的本机窗口或 .NET Windows 窗体实现通用化自定义消息处理 。

span.span: Override this method in a derived class to implement generalized custom message handling for a specific native window or .NET Windows Forms .

para.span: 自定义处理可以在之前、之后或在调用此方法的基类实现（执行标准消息处理）之前执行。

span.span: Custom processing can be performed before, after, or instead of a call to the base class implementation of this method, which performs standard message processing.

para.span: 与此相反，可以通过类的方法来为应用程序添加自定义消息处理 。

span.span: In contrast, adding customized message handling for an application can be accomplished through the method of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DestroyHandle() cil managed
abstract member DestroyHandle : unit -> unit override this.DestroyHandle : unit -> unit

span.span: Destroys the window and its handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会销毁与关联的窗口 ，将 属性设置为0，并调用 方法来反映更改。This method destroys the window associated with the , sets the property to 0, and calls the method to reflect the change. 通常，仅在 完成本机窗口时调用。Typically, you only call when you are done with the native window. > [!NOTE] > 类会自动销毁关联的窗口并释放其资源，以响应 WM_DESTROY 的消息。The class automatically will destroy the associated window and release its resources in response to a WM_DESTROY message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与此窗口相关联的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法删除与当前实例关联的 Win32 派生类 ，释放该句柄，然后将 WM_CLOSE 消息发布到关联的窗口。The method removes the Win32 derived class associated with the current instance, releases the handle, and posts a WM_CLOSE message to the associated window.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow FromHandle(native int handle) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromHandle (handle As IntPtr) As NativeWindow

span.span: A handle to a window.

summary.span: 检索与指定句柄相关联的窗口。

span.span: Retrieves the window associated with the specified handle.
The associated with the specified handle.

returns.span: 当句柄没有关联窗口时，此方法将返回 。

span.span: This method returns when the handle does not have an associated window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果收到来自其他方法的句柄，请使用此方法检索与该句柄关联的窗口。If you receive a handle from another method, use this method to retrieve the window associated with the handle. 在当前进程中，句柄必须已为另一个句柄 ，否则 `null` 返回。The handle must already be owned by another in the current process; otherwise, `null` is returned.

public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: Gets the handle for this window.

value.span: 如果成功，则为一个 （表示关联的本机 Win32 窗口的句柄）；否则为 0（如果窗口没有任何关联句柄）。

span.span: If successful, an representing the handle to the associated native Win32 window; otherwise, 0 if no handle is associated with the window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用需要窗口或控件的句柄的 Windows API 方法时，请使用此方法。Use this method when calling Windows API methods that require a handle for a window or control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建具有特定操作系统窗口类名的窗口。The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name. 该示例创建一个继承自的类 以实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. 该示例还演示如何重写 方法，以便在发生更改时收到通知 。The example also demonstrates overriding the method to be notified when the changes. `MyNativeWindow`类使用 "设置为" 按钮创建一个新窗口 。The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the set to BUTTON. 这将创建一个 Win32 按钮窗口。This creates a Win32 button window. 设置按钮的位置和大小，以及指定其他窗口样式。The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles. 类演示如何使用 方法并重写 方法，以截获接收的窗口消息。The class demonstrates how to use the method and override the method to intercept window messages that are received. 尽管该示例查找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 的消息，但可以使用特定于所创建的类型的窗口消息将其替换为实际程序。Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this could be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件类型将其窗口消息发送到窗口父级而不是窗口。Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 平台 SDK。See the Windows Platform SDK for more information. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指定当更改窗口句柄时所调用的通知方法。

span.span: Specifies a notification method that is called when the handle for a window is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性的值更改时，将调用此方法 。This method is invoked when the value of the property has changed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建具有特定操作系统窗口类名的窗口。The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name. 该示例创建一个继承自的类 以实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. 该示例还演示如何重写 方法，以便在发生更改时收到通知 。The example also demonstrates overriding the method to be notified when the changes. `MyNativeWindow`类创建一个新窗口，并将 设置为 `BUTTON` 。The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the set to `BUTTON`. 这将创建一个 Win32 按钮窗口。This creates a Win32 button window. 设置按钮的位置和大小，以及指定其他窗口样式。The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles. 类演示如何使用 方法并重写 方法，以截获接收的窗口消息。The class demonstrates how to use the method and override the method to intercept window messages that are received. 尽管该示例查找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 的消息，但可以使用特定于所创建的类型的窗口消息将其替换为实际程序。Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this can be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created. 此代码摘自类概述中所示的示例 。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示某些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅。See for the whole code listing. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件类型将其窗口消息发送到窗口父级而不是窗口。Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 平台 SDK。See the Windows Platform SDK for more information. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 释放与此窗口相关联的句柄。

span.span: Releases the handle associated with this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会销毁窗口句柄。This method does not destroy the window handle. 相反，它将句柄的窗口过程设置为默认窗口过程。Instead, it sets the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure. 它将 属性设置为0，并调用 来反映更改。It sets the property to 0 and calls to reflect the change. 如果窗口收到本机 Win32 WM_NCDESTROY 消息，则它会自动调用此方法，指示 Windows 已销毁该句柄。A window automatically calls this method if it receives a native Win32 WM_NCDESTROY message, indicating that Windows has destroyed the handle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在窗口过程中截获操作系统窗口消息。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure. 该示例创建一个继承自的类 以实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类挂接到传入构造函数的窗体的窗口过程中，并重写 方法以截获 `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` 窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercepts the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示如何使用 和 方法来标识将使用的窗口句柄 。The class demonstrates the use of the and methods to identify the window handle the will use. 句柄根据和事件进行分配 。The handle is assign based upon the and events. `WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收到窗口消息后，类会调用 `form1.ApplicationActivated` 方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. 此代码摘自类概述中所示的示例 。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示某些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 调用与此窗口关联的默认窗口过程。

span.span: Invokes the default window procedure associated with this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将窗口消息发送到窗口的句柄时，将调用此方法。This method is called when a window message is sent to the handle of the window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在窗口过程中截获操作系统窗口消息。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure. 该示例创建一个继承自的类 以实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类挂接到传入构造函数的窗体的窗口过程中，并重写 方法以截获 `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` 窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercept the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示如何使用 和 方法来标识将使用的窗口句柄 。The class demonstrates the use of the and methods to identify the window handle the will use. 该句柄根据 和事件进行分配 。The handle is assigned based upon the and events. `WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收到窗口消息后，类会调用 `form1.ApplicationActivated` 方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. 此代码摘自类概述中所示的示例 。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示某些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#2)]

para.span: 重写此方法以实现特定消息处理。

span.span: Override this method to implement specific message processing.

para.span: 调用 基数。 不处理消息的 WndProc。

span.span: Call base.WndProc for unhandled messages.
